languages.text: "Чушь! Лорд-капитан не покидал{mf||а} мостик. А лифт был сброшен, чтобы не дать мятежникам сюда прорваться!"
"Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"
languages.original_text: "Чушь! Лорд-капитан не покидал{mf||а} мостик. А лифт был сброшен, чтобы не дать мятежникам сюда прорваться!"

traits.locale_text: "Nonsense! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Nonsense! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: «¡Y una mierda de Grox! {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán nunca ha dejado el puente. ¡Soltamos el ascensor para que no entraran los amotinados!».
languages.original_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y una mierda de Grox! {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán nunca ha dejado el puente. ¡Soltamos el ascensor para que no entraran los amotinados!».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: 「クソが！ロード・キャプテンはずっとブリッジにいた。エレベーターを落として、反乱軍を遠ざけなければ！」
languages.original_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"

traits.locale_text: 「クソが！ロード・キャプテンはずっとブリッジにいた。エレベーターを落として、反乱軍を遠ざけなければ！」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: “胡说八道！舰长大人一刻都没离开过舰桥！电梯是我们炸掉的，是为了阻止叛乱分子冲进来！”
languages.original_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"

traits.locale_text: “胡说八道！舰长大人一刻都没离开过舰桥！电梯是我们炸掉的，是为了阻止叛乱分子冲进来！”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Groxscheiße! Der Lord Captain hat die Brücke nie verlassen. Wir haben den Aufzug abstürzen lassen, um die Meuterer fernzuhalten!"
languages.original_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"

traits.locale_text: "Groxscheiße! Der Lord Captain hat die Brücke nie verlassen. Wir haben den Aufzug abstürzen lassen, um die Meuterer fernzuhalten!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: « Foutre de grox ! {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} n'a jamais quitté la passerelle. Si on a fait tomber cet ascenseur, c'était pour nous débarrasser des mutins ! »
languages.original_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"

traits.locale_text: « Foutre de grox ! {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} n'a jamais quitté la passerelle. Si on a fait tomber cet ascenseur, c'était pour nous débarrasser des mutins ! »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: "Saçmalık! Lord Kaptan köprüden asla ayrılmadı. Asansörü isyancıları dışarıda tutmak için düşürdük!"
languages.original_text: "Groxshit! The Lord Captain never left the bridge. We dropped the elevator to keep the mutineers out!"
